questions.text: Which word in this sentence best describes an adverb? He paced nervously down the hallway.

title: Biology
desc: Biology is a natural science discipline that studies living things.

title: US History
desc: The United States of America is a nation with a rich history and a noble goal: government of the people, by the people, for the people.
